info.title: Azure SQL Database server firewall rules
info.description: Provides create, read, update, and delete functionality for Azure SQL Database server firewall rules.

parameters.name: firewallRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the firewall rule.

Delete a firewall rule.request:

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address of the firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format. Use value '0.0.0.0' to represent all Azure-internal IP addresses.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address of the firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format. Must be greater than or equal to startIpAddress. Use value '0.0.0.0' to represent all Azure-internal IP addresses.

FirewallRuleProperties.description: Represents the properties of a server firewall rule.

kind.description: Kind of server that contains this firewall rule.

location.description: Location of the server that contains this firewall rule.

value.description: The list of server firewall rules.

FirewallRuleListResult.description: Represents the response to a List Firewall Rules request.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
